offensive_magics.name: Magic Bolt
offensive_magics.description: Enhance the default projectile. Magic Bolt is the basic magic the player utilizes in the game. The player slings a single projectile at the nearest enemy. It is the only spell that can acquire multiple attributes, one at level 4, and another at level 7, and because of this it can obtain a Magic Combination without reaching max level.

lv_4.name: Magic Arrow
lv_4.function: Magic Bolts penetrate all enemies. Increase Magic Bolt Damage by 80%. Increase Magic Bolt Size by 180%. Increase Magic Bolt Speed by 180%. Used in: Blaster.

lv_4.name: Fireworks
lv_4.function: Magic Bolts split into threes and explode. Increase Magic Bolt Damage by 50%. Increase Magic Bolt Cooldown by 2 seconds. Used in: Pyrotechnics.

lv_4.name: Fission
lv_4.function: Magic Bolts are fired towards 2 additional targets.

lv_7.name: Chain Casting
lv_7.function: Increase Magic Bolt Number by 1. Decrease Magic Bolt Cooldown by 20%.

lv_7.name: Fire at Will
lv_7.function: Magic Bolts are fired in random directions. Increase Magic Bolt Number by 5X. Increase Magic Bolt Damage by 50%. Increase Magic Bolt Cooldown by 3 seconds. Used in: Frenzy, Ruler of Storms, Prism Spray, Black Death.

lv_7.name: Doppelganger
lv_7.function: Instead of firing Magic Bolts, summon 3 Mirages that fire Magic Bolts. Increase Magic Bolt Cooldown by 50%. Used in: Avatar.

offensive_magics.name: Fireball
offensive_magics.description: Launch an explosive projectile. Fireball slings an explosive projectile at the nearest enemy, dealing AoE damage upon impact.

attributes.name: Big Bang
attributes.function: When casting Fireball First Fireball's Damage and Size increase by x1.5. Fireball Damage increases by 80%.

attributes.name: Poison Gas
attributes.function: Fireball explosion Expands and inflicts damage 3 times. Fireball Damage reduces by 30%.

attributes.name: Constellation
attributes.function: Fireball is fired at a random location and persists for a short time, following the character. Fireball's Movement Speed gradually decrease. Fireball's Penetration +1.

offensive_magics.name: Thunderstorm
offensive_magics.description: A thunderstorm falls upon nearby enemies. Thunderstorm strikes the nearest enemies with lightning bolts, dealing both direct and Area-of-Effect damage.
offensive_magics.note: As of version 0.956, this magic is affected by the 'Enchant Bug', where levels 2-6 give an additional Damage +40% and Cooldown -5%, for a total of Damage +200% and Cooldown -25%.

attributes.name: A Bolt from the Blue
attributes.function: Thunderstorms are spawned continuously between 1-3 times. Thunderstorm's Cooldown reduces by 25%.

attributes.name: Lightning Blast
attributes.function: Thunderstorm explosion expands. Thunderstorms are spawned sequentially at random points. Thunderstorm Damage increases by 80%.

attributes.name: Judgement
attributes.function: Thunderstorms Merge into one. Inflicts Half damage to nearby enemies outside of the explosion. Size increases by 20% per number of Thunderstorm. Thunderstorm Damage x5. Thunderstorm Cooldown x2.

offensive_magics.name: Meteor
offensive_magics.description: A meteor falls on a random location. Meteor summons a flaming rock from the top of the screen, smashing into the floor and dealing damage in an area of effect.

attributes.name: Volcanic Eruption
attributes.function: Meteor immediately explodes leaving a Crater inflicting 25% of Meteor Damage per sec. (Crater's Duration: 3sec).

attributes.name: Meteor Shower
attributes.function: The number of Meteors x3. Meteor Spawn Interval reduces by 30%. Meteor Damage reduces by 25%. Meteor's Size reduces by 25%.

attributes.name: Asteroid
attributes.function: Meteors are Merged into one. Size increases by 50% per Meteor. Meteor Damage x3. Meteor's Cooldown x2.

offensive_magics.name: Cyclone
offensive_magics.description: Cause a gust of wind that grows in size and deals damage. Cyclone sends a whirlwind towards the nearest enemy, dealing periodic damage in an area of affect.

attributes.name: Extreme Weather
attributes.function: Number of Cyclone +2. Cyclone Cooldown reduces by 10%.

attributes.name: Electric Orb
attributes.function: The Cyclone gradually shrinks and fires projectiles in random directions. Cyclone Damage 2X. Cyclone's Size increases by 30%.

attributes.name: Void
attributes.function: Cyclone get spawned sequentially at random locations where they remain. Cyclone Size Expansion Speed 9X. Cyclone Duration reduces by 50%. Cyclone Cooldown 2X.

offensive_magics.name: Electric Shock
offensive_magics.description: Release electricity in a random direction. Electric Shock causes lightning bolt projectiles to erupt from the player, traveling outwards in random directions.
offensive_magics.note: As of version 0.956, this magic is affected by the 'Enchant Bug', where levels 2-6 give an additional Damage +40% and Cooldown -5%, for a total of Damage +200% and Cooldown -25%.

attributes.name: Chain Lightning
attributes.function: Electric shock Chains over 1~3 times. Electric Shock Damage increases by 50%.

attributes.name: High Output
attributes.function: Electric Shock Missile Damage increases by x2.5 with 50% chance of success. Electric Shock Cooldown reduces by 15%.

attributes.name: Superconductivity
attributes.function: Electric Shocks are spawned sequentially towards nearby enemies. Electric Shock Damage 3X. Electric Shock Size 2X.

offensive_magics.name: Energy Bolt
offensive_magics.description: Fire a penetrating projectile nearby. Energy Bolt periodically sends out bursts of electric energy balls towards the nearest enemies, passing through them and dealing damage on contact.
offensive_magics.note: As of version 0.956, this magic is affected by the 'Enchant Bug', where levels 2-6 give an additional Damage +40% and Cooldown -5%, for a total of Damage +200% and Cooldown -25%.

attributes.name: Charged Particles
attributes.function: At the end of Energy Bolt's duration, all bolts return to the character. Number of Energy Bolt +35%. Energy Bolt Speed of Projectile +35%.

attributes.name: Spark
attributes.function: Energy Bolts deal damage every 0.3 sec. Energy Bolt Duration 2.5X. Energy Bolt Size +25%. Energy Bolt Damage -25%.

attributes.name: Flare
attributes.function: Energy Bolts spread in all directions at once, and explode with doubled power at the end of their duration. Energy Bolt Damage +30%.

offensive_magics.name: Incineration
offensive_magics.description: Launch flames in front of the character. Incineration periodically blasts a continuous cone of fire in the direction you're facing.

attributes.name: Flame Strike
attributes.function: Power gradually increases as Incineration is launched (Max Multiplier: Damage x4, Size x1.5). Number of Incineration +25%.

attributes.name: Pyromaniac
attributes.function: Spawn 2 flames of equal damage whenever Incineration is launched. Incineration Cooldown -20%.

attributes.name: Cerberus Flame
attributes.function: Incineration is additionally launched sideways. Incineration Damage +30%. Incineration Range +20%. Incineration Horizontal Size -33%. Number of Incineration -33%.

offensive_magics.name: Blizzard
offensive_magics.description: Raise a Blizzard that freezes enemies. Blizzard summons ice projectiles that randomly rain down around the player in an area of effect. Enemies struck by Blizzard take damage and have a chance to be frozen.
offensive_magics.note: There is a bug where the number of projectiles increases by 8 at levels 2 and 5, instead of the stated 6.

attributes.name: Sub-Zero
attributes.function: All enemies' movement speed is reduced by 3% per second while Blizzard is active. This reduction resets when Blizzard ends. Number of Blizzard +30%.

attributes.name: Shooting Star
attributes.function: Blizzard's drop velocity slows down. Blizzard Damage x2. Blizzard Size x1.35. Number of Blizzard -50%. Blizzard Spawn Interval x2.

attributes.name: Blaze
attributes.function: Blizzard immediately explodes 2 times in a row, and Power reduces by 10% per explosion. Blizzard's Freeze Feature disappears. Blizzard Spawn Interval -30%. Blizzard Spawn Radius -30%.

offensive_magics.name: Tsunami
offensive_magics.description: Create a giant wave that crosses through the field. Tsunami summons a large set of waves that travel from the top-left to the bottom-right side of the screen, damaging enemies who come into contact with it.

attributes.name: Pole
attributes.function: A Tsunami is created simultaneously in all directions and Freezes enemies.

attributes.name: Siren Song
attributes.function: A Tsunami is created closer to where the character is moving towards. Tsunami Cooldown -50%. Number of Tsunami -50%.

attributes.name: Great Eruption
attributes.function: Tsunami's Spawn radius widens. Tsunami Damage x2. Tsunami Size x10%. Tsunami Cooldown +30%.

offensive_magics.name: Spirit
offensive_magics.description: Summon a Spirit that augments attacks. Spirit surrounds the player with magic orbs that attack nearby enemies with a penetrating projectile.
offensive_magics.note: As of version 0.956, this magic is affected by the 'Enchant Bug', where levels 2-6 give an additional Damage +40% and Cooldown -5%, for a total of Damage +200% and Cooldown -25%.

attributes.name: Magic Missile
attributes.function: Spirit's Cooldown becomes faster in proportion to the number of Spirits. And Launch Interval becomes the same as the Cooldown. Spirit Cooldown -20%.

attributes.name: Magic Blade
attributes.function: A Spirit projectile in the form of a Blade is immediately hurled at the target. Spirit Damage x2.5.

attributes.name: Familiar
attributes.function: The spirits are Merged into one. A Spirit fires missiles in all directions. +15 shots per Spirit. Spirit Attack Interval 1/5. Spirit Cooldown x5.

offensive_magics.name: Satellite
offensive_magics.description: Creates a Satellite that rotates around the character. Satellite creates spheres that orbit a set distance around the player, dealing damage to any enemy that touches them.
offensive_magics.note: As of version 0.956, this magic is affected by the 'Enchant Bug', where levels 2-6 give an additional Damage +40% and Cooldown -5%, for a total of Damage +200% and Cooldown -25%.

attributes.name: Anti-Gravity
attributes.function: The rotation speed of the Satellite gradually increases up to x3, then returns to the original rotation speed again.

attributes.name: Will o' the Wisp
attributes.function: Satellite is divided into two rings. Number of Satellite 2X. Satellite Rotational Speed +33%. Satellite Size -33%.

attributes.name: Nuclear Fusion
attributes.function: Satellites are combined into one. Satellites inflict damage every 0.3 sec. Increase Damage Multiplier by 1 for each Satellite. Increase Size Multiplier by 1 for each Satellite. Satellite Rotational Speed -50%.

offensive_magics.name: Arcane Ray
offensive_magics.description: Shoot a ray that penetrates all objects. Arcane Ray fires off a penetrating ray, dealing damage to enemies that touch it. These rays reach to the edge of the screen and are not blocked by anything.
offensive_magics.note: As of version 0.956, this magic is affected by the 'Enchant Bug', where levels 2-6 give an additional Damage +40% and Cooldown -5%, for a total of Damage +200% and Cooldown -25%.

attributes.name: Reflect
attributes.function: Each Arcane Ray spawns a second one directly opposite. This effectively doubles the number of rays. Arcane Ray Damage +50%. Arcane Ray Generation Interval -50%.

attributes.name: Disintegration Ray
attributes.function: Arcane Ray spins around the character rapidly. Arcane Ray Damage 2X. Arcane Ray Cooldown +50%.

attributes.name: Electromagnetic Burst
attributes.function: Fire 1~Max Number Arcane Rays in random directions. Arcane Rays deal damage every 0.5 sec. Arcane Ray Duration 4X.

offensive_magics.name: Electric Zone
offensive_magics.description: Damage nearby enemies over a certain interval. Electric Zone creates a permanent field of electricity around the player, periodically dealing damage to enemies within the area of effect.

attributes.name: Electricity Blast
attributes.function: Electric Zone Damage +80%. Electric Zone Size +30%.

attributes.name: EMP
attributes.function: Enemies are stunned after every 4 times they receive damage from Electric Zone. Electric Zone Damage Interval -10%.

attributes.name: Fire Aura
attributes.function: Electric Zone no longer damages enemies multiple times, but expands and disappears over a certain cycle. The Cycle's length is inversely related to the Damage Interval. Electric Zone Damage 5X. Electric Zone Damage Interval 3X.

offensive_magics.name: Frost Nova
offensive_magics.description: Freeze nearby enemies for a moment. Frost Nova creates an area of effect explosion centered on the player, damaging enemies and freezing all but the biggest ones.

attributes.name: Absolute Zero
attributes.function: Freezes enemies near the explosion, not just those caught in it. Freeze Duration +25%.

attributes.name: Ice Age
attributes.function: Frost Nova explodes 3 times in a row. Damage & Size are multiplied by 1.5 per explosion. Frost Nova Size -20%. Frost Nova Cooldown 2X.

attributes.name: Earthquake
attributes.function: Frost Nova no longer freezes enemies and instead stuns them. Frost Nova Damage 2X. Frost Nova Size +25%.

offensive_magics.name: Lava Zone
offensive_magics.description: Create a Lava Zone that continuously damages enemies for a certain duration. Lava Zone summons a lava field that damages enemies for a set period of time.

attributes.name: Melt
attributes.function: Each time an enemy is damaged by Lava Zone, they take 5% additional damage from all sources (Max Multiplier: 30%). Lava Zone Cooldown -15%.

attributes.name: Crater
attributes.function: Number of Lava Zone 2X. Lava Zone Size -20%. Lava Zone Duration -20%.

attributes.name: Magma Eruption
attributes.function: Lava Zones combine into one. Lava Zone Size increases by 30% per number of Lava Zone. Lava Zone Damage x2. Lava Zone Cooldown x2.

offensive_magics.name: Flash Shock
offensive_magics.description: Creates a flash that moves in the direction that the character is currently moving towards and damages enemies. It deals high damage in a large area, at a cost of a long cooldown.

attributes.name: Wipeout
attributes.function: The damage inflicted by Flash Shock's central beam is multiplied by 10. Flash Shock Size +30%.

attributes.name: Ragnarok
attributes.function: Flash Shock's spawn radius widens. Number of Flash Shock +5. Flash Shock Cooldown 2X.

attributes.name: Satan's Nails
attributes.function: Flash Shocks spawn in random locations and move in random directions. Additional Flash Shocks are also generated on both sides. Number of Flash Shocks increases by 1 each time it is cast, this resets every 4th cast. Flash Shock Damage +33%. Flash Shock Size -50%.

utility_magics.name: Shield
utility_magics.description: Create a Shield that blocks damage once. The initial level provides two charges, with each charge protecting from one attack.

attributes.name: Barrier
attributes.function: Increase the maximum number of Shields by 2.

attributes.name: Reconstruct
attributes.function: Shields are charged 2 at a time. Increase the maximum number of Shields by 1. Shield Cooldown +20%.

attributes.name: Destruction Field
attributes.function: Cause an Explosion when a Shield is broken. The Explosion follows the character and inflicts damage 4 times.

utility_magics.name: Cloaking
utility_magics.description: Pass through all objects for a moment, and increase Movement Speed. Cloaking allows the player to completely avoid collision with all enemies and avoid damage for a short period of time, then the skill goes on cooldown.

attributes.name: Mirage
attributes.function: Cloaking duration increases by 80%.

attributes.name: Space Warp
attributes.function: Once the Cloaking Duration is over, causes a powerful Explosion around the character.

attributes.name: Soul Harvest
attributes.function: Recovers 0.1% HP per enemy slayed while in Cloaking state and Mana Gain increases by 33%.

utility_magics.name: Magic Circle
utility_magics.description: Amplify ATK for a certain duration. Magic Circle summons a spell circle around the player that increases the Attack Amplification during its duration.

attributes.name: Unleash Mana
attributes.function: All magic cooldowns are reduced by 15% while the Magic Circle is active. Magic Circle Cooldown -15%.

attributes.name: Material Synthesis
attributes.function: When casting a Magic Circle, spawns 5 items nearby. Increase Mana Acquisition by 15%.

attributes.name: Great Magic Circle
attributes.function: Increase Magic Circle effect by 2X. Magic Circle Duration +33%. Magic Circle Cooldown +33%.

utility_magics.name: Armageddon
utility_magics.description: Remove all enemies. Armageddon is essentially a magic nuke: it drops a magical orb on the player's screen (centered on the character), eradicating every enemy in sight.

attributes.name: Apocalypse
attributes.function: After Armageddon explodes, the HP of all enemies is reduced by 40%. This HP reduction gradually returns to 0% over 20sec.

attributes.name: Rapture
attributes.function: Recovers all HP every 4th time Armageddon is cast. HP regen per sec +0.1%.

attributes.name: Doom Prophet
attributes.function: Picking up a Mana Orb of any type removes 1 second from Armageddon's current cooldown. Armageddon Cooldown -10%.

passive_magics.name: Vitality
passive_magics.description: Increase Max HP by 20%. Increase Life Orb HP Recovery by 10%

growth_passive_magics.description: Once you reach the maximum level (100 by default), you can still learn 'Growth' passives, which are different versions of the regular passive magics.

magic_combinations.description: Magic Combinations or Fusions are an additional option on level up that lets the player fuse two max level spells. The player gains magic combination options on character Level 25, 50 and 75. One of the two spells (Primary) is enhanced, while the other one (Secondary) is lost and cannot be used or combined with another spell. There are currently 60 fusions available as of v0.956.

combinations.name: Avatar
combinations.description: Summons 3 additional Mirages that fire Magic Bolts. Mirages only fire 1 Magic Bolt at a time. Each Magic Bolt increases Damage by 33%. Increase Magic Bolt Damage by 9.99X. Decrease Magic Bolt Cooldown by 33%.

combinations.name: Pyrotechnics
combinations.description: Magic Bolt explodes at random locations. Magic Bolt explosions Expand, dealing 1~9X power. Increase Magic Bolt Damage by 5X. Increase Magic Bolt Size by 50%.

combinations.name: Blaster
combinations.description: Every 6th Magic Bolt fired has 7X power. Increase Magic Bolt Damage by 5X. Increase Magic Bolt Size by 50%.

combinations.name: Prism Spray
combinations.description: Instead of creating Arcane Rays on the opposite side, they are created at the same time in random directions 5 times in a row. The Arcane Ray's Duration is converted into its Damage. Increase Arcane Ray Damage by 7X. Decrease Arcane Ray Cooldown by 25%.

combinations.name: Ruler of Storms
combinations.description: 3 Cyclones are created in a row in multiple directions. The Cyclone's Movement Speed increases and then decreases gradually. Increase Cyclone Damage by 10X. Increase Cyclone Size by 20%. Decrease Cyclone Duration by 50%.

combinations.name: Black Death
combinations.description: Fireballs explode instantly on random enemies. Fireball Damage is increased by 50% for every 1 Penetration. Increase Fireball Damage by 9X. Increase Fireball Number by 9X. Increase Fireball Cooldown by 3X.

combinations.name: Frenzy
combinations.description: Flash Shock generates faster and farther. Casting Number Stacks start at 3 and reset at 7; for each cooldown decrease from 5 seconds to 0.5 seconds, Casting Number Stack increases by 1. Increase Flash Shock Damage by 7X. Decrease Flash Shock Cooldown by 50%.

combinations.name: Supernova
combinations.description: Fires Spirit projectiles at once. Increase Spirit Damage by 24X. Increase Spirit Size by 100%. Decrease Spirit Launch Number by 75%. Increase Spirit Cooldown by 2X.

combinations.name: Telekinetic Sword
combinations.description: Spirit projectiles cut through enemies faster and become longer. For every 0.15 seconds reduction in Spirit cooldown, Damage Multiplier and Attack Number are increased by 1. Increase Spirit Damage by 3X.

combinations.name: Mana Spear
combinations.description: Spirit now uses its default Cooldown and Launch Interval. Spirit Projectile Speed and Range is increased dramatically. Increase Spirit Damage by 10X. Increase Spirit Size by 200%. Increase Spirit Cooldown by 2X.

combinations.name: Genocide
combinations.description: Arcane Rays are Unified into one and spin faster. Arcane Ray Size Increase is converted into Damage. Arcane Ray Number increases Damage Multiplier by 4 each. Decrease Arcane Ray Duration by 33%. Increase Arcane Ray Cooldown by 33%.

combinations.name: Current Overload
combinations.description: Electric Shocks no longer chain, but are created 3 to 7 times in a row. Electric Shock has longer range. Increase Electric Shock Damage by 8X.

combinations.name: Crazed Spray
combinations.description: Energy Bolts split into 4 and fire in all directions. Energy Bolt projectiles continue moving forwards. Increase Energy Bolt Damage by 10X. Increase Energy Bolt Number by 3X. Increase Energy Bolt Duration by 30%.

combinations.name: Brandish
combinations.description: Flash Shock generates consecutively 7 times in all directions; for each cooldown decrease from 5 seconds to 0.5 seconds, Number increases by 1. Flash Shock deals damage only at the Core. Decrease Flash Shock Cooldown by 50%.

combinations.name: Energy Bombardment
combinations.description: Multiple Arcane Rays are created in random directions at once. Arcane Rays do not rotate anymore. Increase Arcane Ray Damage by 20X. Increase Arcane Ray Size by 5X. Decrease Arcane Ray Duration by 75%.

combinations.name: Plasma Ray
combinations.description: Arcane Ray is Fixed at 4 and becomes Permanent; for each 0.6-second decrease from 3 seconds cooldown, 1 Ray is added. Arcane Ray Size and Duration are converted into Damage. Arcane Ray deals damage every 0.25 seconds. Increase Arcane Ray Damage Multiplier by 1 per Number.

combinations.name: Terra Current
combinations.description: Arcane Rays can attack targets in a wider range. Arcane Rays switch directions every 0.5 seconds. Arcane Ray gains 1X Damage Multiplier for every 1 sec of duration. Increase Arcane Ray Damage by 4X. Decrease Arcane Ray Cooldown by 50%.

combinations.name: Breath of Fire
combinations.description: Incineration no longer fires sideways from the character but to five directions outwards from the character. Incinerations are created with longer range and at a faster speed. Increase Incineration Damage by 6X. Increase Incineration Number by 30%.

combinations.name: Gate
combinations.description: Flash Shock Size Increase is converted into Damage. Increase Flash Shock Damage by 12X. Increase Flash Shock Number by 6X. Decrease Flash Shock Cooldown by 30%.

combinations.name: Exidium
combinations.description: Flash Shock core size increases. Increase Flash Shock Damage by 7X. Increase Flash Shock Size by 100%. Decrease Flash Shock Cooldown by 25%.

combinations.name: Inferno
combinations.description: Incineration generates faster and increases Max Multiplier (Max Multiplier: Damage X30, Size X2). Decrease Incineration Cooldown by 25%.

combinations.name: Hellfire
combinations.description: Incineration generates 2X. Incineration Flames explode consecutively 2~3 times. Increase Incineration Damage by 12X. Increase Incineration Size by 100%. Increase Incineration Cooldown by 50%.

combinations.name: Ether Blaze
combinations.description: Each Blizzard explosion splits into 2. Increase Blizzard Damage by 8X. Increase Blizzard Size by 20%. Decrease Blizzard Interval by 30%.

combinations.name: Lightning Breath
combinations.description: Electric shocks are generated in front of the character by 3. Increase Electric Shock Damage by 7X. Increase Electric Shock Number by 2X. Increase Electric Shock Cooldown by 50%.

combinations.name: Flame Storm
combinations.description: 6 Meteors are created in a straight line with the character in the middle. Meteor Craters no longer damage enemies. Increase Meteor Damage by 9X. Decrease Meteor Size by 33%.

combinations.name: Demon Equation
combinations.description: Fireballs are launched at the same time in multiple directions and the attribute affect Big Bang will no longer be active. Increase Fireball Damage by 6.66X. Increase Fireball Penetration by 2. Increase Fireball Number by 4X. Increase Fireball Cooldown by 3.3X.

combinations.name: Ghastly Rampage
combinations.description: Fireball Pierces all enemies and moves randomly. Fireball explodes with 3X power only when it dissapears. Fireball Damage increases proportionally to its duration. Each Fireball Pierce value increases Damage Multiplier by 3. Increase Fireball Damage by 4X. Decrease Fireball Cooldown by 33%.

combinations.name: Winter Storm
combinations.description: Blizzard explosions expand. Increase Blizzard Damage by 8X. Increase Blizzard Size by 25%. Decrease Blizzard Number by 25%.

combinations.name: Genesis
combinations.description: Blizzard Cooldown becomes faster in proportion to the number, and the Generation Interval becomes equal to the Cooldown. Increase Blizzard Damage by 30X. Decrease Blizzard Cooldown by 30%.

combinations.name: Origin Explosion
combinations.description: Energy Bolts explode immediately after spreading in all directions. Energy Bolt Damage increases proportionally to its duration. Increase Energy Bolt Damage by 8X. Increase Energy Bolt Explosion Size by 50%. Increase Energy Bolt Number by 50%. Increase Energy Bolt Cooldown by 2X.

combinations.name: Heart of Lightning
combinations.description: Every time Electric Shock is chained, the projectile splits in 2, and its Damage and Size is decreased by 20%. Electric Shock is chained at a higher speed. Increase Electric Shock Damage by 6X.

combinations.name: Meissner Effect
combinations.description: When EMP stuns a target, knock it back and deal 10X additional damage. Increase Electric Zone Size by 100%. Increase Amplify ATK by 25%.

combinations.name: Lightning Bolts
combinations.description: 5 Thunderstorms are created in a row at random locations. Each Thunderstorm increases the new Thunderstorm's Creation Radius and Number by 30%. Increase Thunderstorm Damage by 12X.

combinations.name: Great Rift
combinations.description: Enemies hit by Frost Nova are all Knocked Back. Frost Nova Damage increases proportionally to its Size. Increase Frost Nova Damage by 10X. Increase Frost Nova Size by 50%. Increase Frost Nova Cooldown by 50%.

combinations.name: Snowflake Blossom
combinations.description: Frost Nova explodes consecutively 24 times near enemies, decreasing Damage and Size by 2% per explosion. Increase Frost Nova Damage by 24X. Decrease Frost Nova Cooldown by 30%.

combinations.name: Frozen Heart
combinations.description: Electric Zone briefly Freezes enemies. Each activation of Electric Zone increases Damage and Size multiplier by 1 and resets at 4 activations. Increase Electric Zone Damage by 20X.

combinations.name: Super Cyclone
combinations.description: All Cyclones are Unified into one. Cyclone persists and follow the character. Damage Multiplier increases in relation to how long Cyclones persist. Cooldown starts when Cyclone's duration is over. Each Cyclone increases the Size of the new Cyclone by 20%. Increase Cyclone Duration by 100%. Increase Cyclone Cooldown by 100%.

combinations.name: Neutron Generation
combinations.description: All Cyclones are Unified into one. Cyclones no longer fire projectiles, but rapidly expand and their speed decreases gradually. Each Cyclone increases the Size of the new Cyclone by 25%. Increase Cyclone Damage by 10X.

combinations.name: Vortex
combinations.description: Cyclones are created near the character and rotate. Cyclones gradually shrink in size. Increase Cyclone Damage by 9X. Increase Cyclone Duration by 9X. Decrease Cyclone Cooldown by 50%.

combinations.name: Black Hole
combinations.description: Cyclone is Unified into one. Enemies hit by Cyclone become Staggered. Cyclone cooldown starts after duration ends. Cyclone Duration Increase is converted into Damage by 3X. Cyclone Number increases Damage Multiplier by 3. Increase Cyclone Damage by 8X.

combinations.name: Great Flood
combinations.description: 2 additional Tsunamis are created on each side of the Tsunami. Tsunamis are always created at the back of the character. Increase Tsunami Damage by 8X. Increase Tsunami Cooldown by 2X.

combinations.name: Phoenix
combinations.description: Tsunami is generated behind the character. Tsunami leaves behind Flames along its path. Increase Tsunami Damage by 24X. Decrease Tsunami Cooldown by 30%. Decrease Tsunami Number by 50%. Increase Revival Number by 1.

combinations.name: Astrape
combinations.description: When a Thunderstorm explodes, it releases a shock wave around the are, dealing half damage to nearby enemies and stunning them. Increase Thunderstorm Damage by 7X. Increase Thunderstorm Size by 25%. Increase Thunderstorm Cooldown by 25%.

combinations.name: Orbital Strike
combinations.description: Thunderstorms are quickly generated near a set location. Increase Thunderstorm Damage by 9X. Increase Thunderstorm Size by 30%. Increase Thunderstorm Cooldown by 30%.

combinations.name: Empyrean Wrath
combinations.description: The Thunderstorm's explosion covers a wider range but does not expand. Increase Thunderstorm Damage by 5X. Increase Thunderstorm Number by 3X.

combinations.name: Great Impact
combinations.description: Meteors are generated 3 times consecutively; the first Meteor's Power increases by 50%. Increase Meteor Damage by 9X. Decrease Meteor Cooldown by 30%. Decrease Meteor Size by 30%.

combinations.name: War Climate
combinations.description: Meteor Cooldown becomes faster depending on the number of Meteors, and they are also created over the same interval as its Cooldown. Meteor Cooldown is also decreased by 0 to 80% for each Meteor. Increase Meteor Damage by 4X.

combinations.name: Furnace
combinations.description: Lava Zones gradually expand. Damage increases in relation to Lava Zone's duration. Increase Lava Zone Damage by 10X. Increase Lava Zone Duration by 30%. Decrease Lava Zone Cooldown by 30%.

combinations.name: Hyperion
combinations.description: Create another combined Satellite on the opposite side. This Satellite has 20% less Damage than the original, but freezes enemies it damages for the first time. Increase Satellite Damage by 200%. Increase Satellite Rotation Speed by 50%.

combinations.name: Age of the Sun
combinations.description: Lava Zone generates simultaneously in all directions and moves. Lava Zone Duration is converted into Damage Multiplier 2 to 1. Increase Lava Zone Damage by 15X. Decrease Lava Zone Cooldown by 30%.

combinations.name: Reaction
combinations.description: Energy Bolts are generated in all directions. Energy Bolts explode at intervals of 0.5 seconds, and each explosion increases their power by 20%. Increase Energy Bolt Damage by 9X. Decrease Energy Bolt Number by 50%.

combinations.name: Magnetic Field
combinations.description: The Rotation Speed bonus of Anti-Gravity is fixed to 2X. Increase Satellite Damage by 7X. Increase Satellite Size by 100%.

combinations.name: Lightning Calibration
combinations.description: Electric Zones rotate around the character as multiple projectiles. Electric Zones no longer have a Damage Interval but have increased Rotation Speed. Increase Electric Zone Damage by 10X. Increase Electric Zone Size by 30%.

combinations.name: Destroyer
combinations.description: Electric Zone is given a Cooldown of 7 seconds and Duration of 3 seconds. Increase Electric Zone Damage by 99X. Increase Electric Zone Size by 99%. Decrease HP Regen by 0.1%.

combinations.name: Photon Explosion
combinations.description: The Shield explodes instead of charging up. Damage and Size of Shields increases by 33% per Shield. Damage increases in relation to All Magic Size Increase. Decrease Shield Cooldown by 70%.

combinations.name: Teleport
combinations.description: Cloaking causes 8 consecutive explosions. Cloaking changes position randomly with each explosion and returns to the original position after the final explosion. Cloaking gains 1 additional Explosion for every 1 second of duration. Increase Cloaking Damage by 4X. Decrease Cloaking Cooldown by 60%.

combinations.name: Perpetual Engine
combinations.description: Magic Circles are permanent. The effect of the Unleash Mana attribute is decreased by half. The Magic Circle's Effect is increased by 1% for every 10% of its Duration and Cooldown Decrease.

combinations.name: Gate of Creation
combinations.description: Increase Magic Combination number by 2. Increase Amplify ATK by 50%.

combinations.name: Overmind
combinations.description: Only Combined Spells can be cast. For each level of acquired Active Magic, the following stats are enchanced: Increase Amplify ATK by 1.5%. Increase All Magic Size by 0.5%. Decrease All Magic Cooldown by 0.3%.

combinations.name: Deus Ex Machina
combinations.description: (Available only in the 3rd combination). Magic Combination is no longer possible. Max Level increases by 10. For each level of acquired Active Magic, the following stats are enchanced: Increase All Magic Damage Multiplier by 0.0125. Decrease All Magic Cooldown by 0.125%.
